Description: Squat globular vase of red marl pottery with a small flat base. The sides expand from the base to the shoulder, then converge to a short neck with evert roll-over rim, which is chipped. Exterior coated with red-orange wash.
Curator's comments: Cemetery R at Hiw was mostly of the Late Predynastic period, see W. M. F. Petrie, 'Diospolis Parva : the cemeteries of Abadiyeh and Hu, 1898-9' (London, 1901), 35.
